about_the_game:
Welcome to Mini Soccer, the delightful and fast-paced soccer game designed for players of all ages, especially younger gamers! Enjoy endless fun on a vibrant, mini soccer field where simplicity meets excitement.

Features:

  • Pick-Up-and-Play: Easy-to-learn controls and mechanics make Mini Soccer perfect for anyone to jump right into the action.

  • Local Multiplayer Fun: Compete against your friends in thrilling head-to-head matches or join forces to take on bots.

  • Seamless Gameplay: Players can join or leave matches at any time and switch teams on the fly, ensuring uninterrupted fun for everyone.

  • Vibrant and Cheerful Design: With charming visuals and a playful atmosphere, Mini Soccer is a treat for players young and old.

Whether you're looking for a quick match or hours of entertainment with friends and family, Mini Soccer is your go-to game for soccer fun. Lace up your shoes, kick the ball, and score big!

  • OS: Ubuntu 20+, Debian, SteamOS or similar
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable GPUs
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or better
